traits.description: Gain 30 Arcane Power whenever you are healed by a health globe.
traits.name: Power Hungry
traits.simpleDescription: "It just doesn't sit right with me. Some of the things these so-called wizards do... They border on necromancy. Or worse! It's just not proper magic." —Venerable Sorcerer Fob Dunar

traits.description: Whenever you deal Arcane damage, enemies are slowed by 30% for 2 seconds.
traits.name: Temporal Flux
traits.simpleDescription: "The energies of time and arcane power are jealous consorts. If you caress the one, you neglect the other at great risk." —Ennead Sage Resko

traits.description: Your critical hits have a chance to reduce the cooldown of your spells by 1 second.
traits.name: Critical Mass
traits.simpleDescription: "As the blast obliterated the walls, she spun the energy of the shockwave into a new spell and hurled it at her stupefied foes." —The Harrowing of Korlean's Stronghold

traits.description: Increases all damage done by 15% but decreases armor and resistances by 10%.
traits.name: Glass Cannon
traits.simpleDescription: "How will I survive? I don't intend to get hit in the first place. If you even touch me, it's because I allowed it." —Maloth, renegade wizard

traits.description:
When you deal damage with a Signature spell, you gain 4 Arcane Power.

The following skills are Signature spells:
Magic Missile
Shock Pulse
Spectral Blade
Electrocute
traits.name: Prodigy
traits.simpleDescription: "Heavy steel armor may turn aside a blade, but let's see how well it works against lightning!" —Larra Stormlash's infamous faux pas at the Royal Westmarch Joust

traits.description: Increases your maximum Arcane Power by 20 and Arcane Power regeneration by 2 per second.
traits.name: Astral Presence
traits.simpleDescription: "Feel the power in the veil that surrounds us—a thunder cloud ready to burst... a volcano about to erupt. Harness it, and you will be invincible." —Adria

traits.description: Whenever you suffer more than 15% of your Life in a single hit, the cooldowns on Mirror Image and Teleport are automatically reset.
traits.name: Illusionist
traits.simpleDescription: "To be where you are not is the wisest of strategies." —Grand Archmage Ralhys

traits.description: Cold damage dealt to chilled and frozen targets is increased by 20%.
traits.name: Black Ice

traits.description: Dealing fire damage to enemies applies a burning effect, increasing all damage done to them by 15% for 3 seconds.
traits.name: Conflagration
traits.simpleDescription: "The red hot armor seared their flesh and boiled their blood as they tried desperately to pry it from smoldering bodies. We finished the defenseless creatures as an act of mercy." —Tales of Caldeum, Volume XII

traits.description: Lightning damage dealt to enemies has up to a 5% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds.
traits.name: Paralysis
traits.simpleDescription: "Some people are shocked by my mastery of magic." —Larra Stormlash

traits.description:
Increases the duration of your Armor spells by 120 seconds. As long as an Armor spell is active, you gain 890 Life per second.

The following skills are improved:
Energy Armor
Ice Armor
Storm Armor
traits.name: Galvanizing Ward
traits.simpleDescription: "Power begets power. The excess energy from one spell is absorbed by the other, and so the effect is sustained." —Excerpt from Grand Master Clavaught's Lecture on Synergistic Effects in Esoteric Arcane Spheres

traits.name: Blur
traits.simpleDescription: Truly powerful Wizards have been known to turn their magic inward, transmuting the very composition of their own bodies for boundless energy and catlike reflexes.

traits.name: Evocation
traits.simpleDescription: So long have you focused on twisting reality to your will that time itself seeks to appease you.

traits.description:
When you deal damage with a Signature spell you may gain a Flash of Insight. After 5 Flashes of Insight, your next non-Signature spell deals 75% additional damage.

The following skills are Signature spells:
Magic Missile
Shock Pulse
Spectral Blade
Electrocute
traits.name: Arcane Dynamo
traits.simpleDescription: Dare not to invoke the wrath of a Wizard. You are nothing more than a loose coalescence of dust before their ire, easily scattered at a whim.

traits.description: When reduced below 20% Life, release a shockwave that knocks all enemies back. This effect cannot occur more than once every 60 seconds.
traits.name: Unstable Anomaly
traits.simpleDescription: "It takes perfect concentration for a Wizard to dance on the edge of infinity. Never be the one to break that concentration." —One-Eye Whipple

runes.name: Charged Blast
runes.description: Increases the damage of Magic Missile to 143% weapon damage as Arcane.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the damage of Magic Missile.

runes.name: Split
runes.description: Fire 3 missiles that each deal 50% weapon damage as Arcane.
runes.simpleDescription: Fire multiple missiles with each attack.

runes.name: Penetrating Blast
runes.description: Missiles have a 70% chance to pierce through their target and hit additional enemies.
runes.simpleDescription: Missiles have a chance to pierce through targets and hit multiple enemies.

runes.name: Attunement
runes.description: Whenever Magic Missile hits a target you gain 4 Arcane Power.
runes.simpleDescription: Whenever Magic Missile hits a target you gain Arcane Power.

runes.name: Seeker
runes.description: Missiles track the nearest enemy and their damage is increased to 121% weapon damage as Arcane.
runes.simpleDescription: Missiles track the nearest enemy and hit for additional damage.

skills.name: Magic Missile
skills.description:
This is a Signature spell. Signature spells are free to cast.

Launch a missile of magic energy, causing 110% weapon damage as Arcane.
skills.simpleDescription:
Signature Spell

Cast a bolt of arcane energy towards a target.

Hold SHIFT to attack without moving.

runes.name: Arcane Nova
runes.description: Modify the orb to deal 250% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies within 20 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the size and damage of Arcane Orb.

runes.name: Tap the Source
runes.description: Reduce casting cost to 23 Arcane Power.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduce the casting cost of Arcane Orb.

runes.name: Obliteration
runes.description: Increase the damage of the explosion to deal 325% weapon damage as Arcane.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the damage of Arcane Orb.

runes.name: Arcane Orbit
runes.description: Create 4 Arcane Orbs that orbit you, exploding for 100% weapon damage as Arcane when enemies get close.
runes.simpleDescription: Create Arcane Orbs that orbit around you, exploding when enemies get close.

runes.name: Celestial Orb
runes.description: The orb will pierce through targets, damaging any enemy it passes through.
runes.simpleDescription: The Orb passes through enemies, damaging all of them.

skills.name: Arcane Orb
skills.description:
Cost: 35 Arcane Power

Hurl an orb of pure energy that explodes when it hits, dealing 250% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies within 10 yards.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 35 Arcane Power

Cast an orb of pure arcane energy that explodes on contact.

runes.name: Explosive Bolts
runes.description: Slain enemies explode, dealing 70% weapon damage as Lightning to every enemy within 10 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: Slain enemies explode and electrocute nearby enemies.

runes.name: Fire Bolts
runes.description: Cast bolts of fire that each deal 137% weapon damage as Fire.
runes.simpleDescription: Cast bolts of fire that burn enemies.

runes.name: Piercing Orb
runes.description: Merge the bolts in a a single giant orb that oscillates forward dealing 105% weapon damage as Lightning to everything it hits.
runes.simpleDescription: Electrocute multiple enemies with a single orb of electricity.

runes.name: Lightning Affinity
runes.description: Every target hit by a pulse restores 2 Arcane Power.
runes.simpleDescription: Every target hit by a pulse restores Arcane Power.

runes.name: Living Lightning
runes.description: Conjure a being of lightning that drifts forward, electrocuting nearby enemies for 37% weapon damage as Lightning.
runes.simpleDescription: Conjure a being of lightning that drifts forward, electrocuting nearby enemies.

skills.name: Shock Pulse
skills.description:
This is a Signature spell. Signature spells are free to cast.

Release a medium range pulse of 3 unpredictable charges of electricity that deal 105% weapon damage as Lightning.
skills.simpleDescription:
Signature Spell

Release bursts of uncontrollable electricity across the ground.

Hold SHIFT to attack without moving.

runes.name: Shatter
runes.description: A frozen enemy that is killed has a 50% chance of releasing another Frost Nova.
runes.simpleDescription: A frozen enemy has a chance of releasing an additional Frost Nova when killed.

runes.name: Cold Snap
runes.description: Reduce cooldown to 9 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduce the cooldown duration of Frost Nova.

runes.name: Frozen Mist
runes.description: The Frost Nova no longer freezes enemies, but instead leaves behind a mist of frost dealing that deals 160% weapon damage as Cold over 8 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: The Frost Nova no longer freezes enemies, but leaves behind a mist that damages enemies.

runes.name: Deep Freeze
runes.description: If Frost Nova hits at least 5 targets, you gain 15% chance to critically hit for 12 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: If Frost Nova hits at least 5 targets, you gain a chance to cause Critical Hits.

runes.name: Bone Chill
runes.description: Enemies take 15% more damage while frozen or chilled by Frost Nova.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies take more damage while frozen or chilled by Frost Nova.

skills.name: Frost Nova
skills.description:
Cooldown: 12 seconds

An explosion of ice freezes nearby enemies for 3 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 12 seconds

Blast nearby enemies and freeze them in place.

runes.name: Snow Blast
runes.description: Damage increases slowly over 1.5 seconds to inflict a maximum of 260% weapon damage as Cold.
runes.simpleDescription: Damage increases the longer Ray of Frost is used.

runes.name: Numb
runes.description: Increase enemy slow amount to 60% for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the potency of the movement slow.

runes.name: Sleet Storm
runes.description: Create a swirling storm around you, dealing 200% weapon damage as Cold to all enemies caught within it.
runes.simpleDescription: Create a swirling storm around you that damages enemies caught in it.

runes.name: Cold Blood
runes.description: Reduce casting cost to 0 Arcane Power.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduce the casting cost Ray of Frost.

runes.name: Black Ice
runes.description: Enemies who die leave a patch of ice on the ground that causes 180% weapon damage as Cold to enemies moving through it over 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies who die leave a patch of ice on the ground that damages enemies that move through it.

skills.name: Ray of Frost
skills.description:
Cost: 20 Arcane Power

Project a beam of frozen ice that blasts 200% weapon damage as Cold to the first enemy it hits, slowing the target's movement by 30% and attack speed by 20% for 3 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 20 Arcane Power

Channel a beam of pure cold and freeze your enemies.

runes.name: Crystal Shell
runes.description: Increase the maximum absorption amount to 17794 damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the maximum amount of damage absorbed.

runes.name: Prism
runes.description: Reduce Arcane Power cost of all spells by 15 while Diamond Skin is active.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduce the Arcane Power cost of all spells while Diamond Skin is active.

runes.name: Mirror Skin
runes.description: Reflects 50% of damage absorbed back at the attacker.
runes.simpleDescription: Reflects a percentage of damage absorbed back at the attacker.

runes.name: Enduring Skin
runes.description: Increase duration to 5 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the duration of Diamond Skin.

runes.name: Diamond Shards
runes.description: When Diamond Skin wears off, diamond shards will explode in all directions dealing 155% weapon damage as Physical to enemies nearby.
runes.simpleDescription: When Diamond Skin wears off, diamond shards explode in all directions.

skills.name: Diamond Skin
skills.description:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Transform your skin to diamond for 3 seconds, absorbing up to 8897 damage from incoming attacks.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Transform your skin to diamond, temporarily absorbing all damage.

runes.name: Deep Cuts
runes.description: Enemies hit by the blade will Bleed for an additional 35% weapon damage done over 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies hit by the blade will Bleed for additional damage.

runes.name: Impactful Blades
runes.description: Hits have a 15% chance to cause Knockback and slow the movement of enemies by 60% for 1 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Hits have a chance to cause Knockback and slow enemies.

runes.name: Siphoning Blade
runes.description: Every enemy hit grants 1 Arcane Power.
runes.simpleDescription: Every enemy hit grants additional Arcane Power.

runes.name: Healing Blades
runes.description: Whenever the blades do critical damage, you are healed 8% of the damage done.
runes.simpleDescription: Whenever the blades do critical damage, you gain Life.

runes.name: Thrown Blade
runes.description: Extends the reach of Spectral Blade to 20 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: Extends the reach of Spectral Blade.

skills.name: Spectral Blade
skills.description:
This is a Signature spell. Signature spells are free to cast.

Summon a spectral blade that strikes all enemies in your path for 105% weapon damage.
skills.simpleDescription:
Signature Spell

Summon mystic blades that slice through enemies.

runes.name: Impactful Wave
runes.description: Increases the distance enemies are knocked back and stuns all affected enemies for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the distance enemies are knocked back and Stuns all affected enemies.

runes.name: Force Affinity
runes.description: Reduce casting cost to 15 Arcane Power and cooldown is reduced to 12 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduce the casting cost and cooldown duration of Wave of Force.

runes.name: Forceful Wave
runes.description: Increases damage to 286% weapon damage as Physical, but reduces knockback.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the damage but no longer knocks enemies back.

runes.name: Teleporting Wave
runes.description: Enemies caught in the wave have a 100% chance to be randomly teleported.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies caught in the wave have a chance to be randomly teleported.

runes.name: Exploding Wave
runes.description: Enemies hit have a 40% chance to cause a smaller Wave of Force that deals 110% weapon damage as Physical and knocks back enemies caught in its wake.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies hit have a chance to release secondary waves.

skills.name: Wave of Force
skills.description:
Cost: 25 Arcane Power
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Discharge a wave of pure energy that repels projectiles and knocks back nearby enemies. This also slows the movement of enemies by 60% and deals 220% weapon damage as Physical.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 25 Arcane Power
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Command the elements to push back enemies and projectiles.

runes.name: Chain Lightning
runes.description: Increases the maximum number of enemies that can be electrocuted to 6.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the maximum number of enemies electrocuted.

runes.name: Forked Lightning
runes.description: Critical Hits release 4 charged bolts in random directions, dealing 46% weapon damage as Lightning to any targets hit.
runes.simpleDescription: Critical Hits release charged bolts that travel in random directions.

runes.name: Lightning Blast
runes.description: Create streaks of lightning that pierce through targets, hitting all enemies for 80% weapon damage as Lightning.
runes.simpleDescription: Create streaks of lightning that pierce all targets hit.

runes.name: Surge of Power
runes.description: Gain 1 Arcane Power for every enemy hit by Electrocute.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Arcane Power for every enemy hit by Electrocute.

runes.name: Arc Lightning
runes.description: Blast a cone of lightning that causes 80% weapon damage as Lightning to all affected targets.
runes.simpleDescription: Blast a cone of lightning.

skills.name: Electrocute
skills.description:
This is a Signature spell. Signature spells are free to cast.

Lightning arcs from your fingertips, dealing 80% weapon damage as Lightning. The lightning can jump, hitting up to 2 additional enemies.
skills.simpleDescription:
Signature Spell

Cast chain lightning that electrocutes up to 3 enemies.

Hold SHIFT to attack without moving.

runes.name: Disruption
runes.description: Targets hit by Arcane Torrent become Disrupted for 6 seconds, causing them to take 15% additional damage from any attacks that deal Arcane damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Targets hit by Arcane Torrent are susceptible to Arcane damage attacks for a limited time.

runes.name: Death Blossom
runes.description: Unleash a torrent of power beyond your control. You no longer direct where the projectiles go, but their damage is increased to 365% weapon damage as Arcane.
runes.simpleDescription: Unleash a torrent of power beyond your control. You no longer direct where the projectiles go, but their damage is increased.

runes.name: Arcane Mines
runes.description: Instead of firing projectiles, lay Arcane mines that arm after 1 second. These mines explode when an enemy approaches, dealing 210% weapon damage as Arcane. Enemies caught in the explosion have their movement and attack speeds reduced by 30% for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Instead of firing projectiles, place Arcane mines. Mines explode when enemies approach, dealing damage and reducing the movement and attack speeds of enemies caught in the blast.

runes.name: Power Stone
runes.description: Every missile hit has a 2% chance to leave behind a Power Stone that grants Arcane Power when picked up.
runes.simpleDescription: Every missile hit has a chance to leave behind a Power Stone that grants Arcane Power when picked up.

runes.name: Cascade
runes.description: Enemies killed by Arcane Torrent have a 100% chance to fire a new missile at a nearby enemy dealing 200% weapon damage as Arcane.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies killed by Arcane Torrent have a chance to fire a new missile at a nearby enemies.

skills.name: Arcane Torrent
skills.description:
Cost: 20 Arcane Power

Hurl a barrage of arcane projectiles that deal 190% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies near the impact location.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 20 Arcane Power

Unleash a barrage of Arcane projectiles.

runes.name: Chilling Aura
runes.description: Lower the temperature of the air around you. Nearby enemies are chilled, slowing their movement speed by 30%.
runes.simpleDescription: Lower the temperature of the air around you. Nearby enemies are chilled, slowing their movement and attack speeds.

runes.name: Crystallize
runes.description: Whenever you are struck by a melee attack your Armor is increased by 25% for 10 seconds. This effect can stack up to 3 times.
runes.simpleDescription: Whenever you are struck by a melee attack, your Armor is increased.

runes.name: Jagged Ice
runes.description: Melee attackers take 96% weapon damage as Cold and are chilled for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Melee attackers take weapon damage and are Frozen.

runes.name: Ice Reflect
runes.description: Melee attacks have up to a 35% chance to create a Frost Nova on the attacker dealing 75% weapon damage as Cold.
runes.simpleDescription: Melee attacks against you have a chance to create a Frost Nova centered on the attacker.

runes.name: Frozen Storm
runes.description: A whirling storm of ice builds around you that deals 30% weapon damage as Cold over 3 seconds after casting Ice Armor.
runes.simpleDescription: A whirling storm of ice builds around you and damages enemies.

skills.name: Ice Armor
skills.description:
Cost: 25 Arcane Power

Surround yourself in a barrier of ice causing 80% weapon damage as Cold to melee attackers, chilling them for 2 seconds. Lasts 120 seconds.

This is an Armor spell. Only one Armor spell can be active at a time.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 25 Arcane Power

Protect yourself with a barrier of ice that freezes attackers.

Only one Armor spell can be active at a time.

runes.name: Mistral Breeze
runes.description: Reduce casting cost to 23 Arcane Power.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduce casting cost of Energy Twister.

runes.name: Gale Force
runes.description: Increase damage to 565% weapon damage as Arcane.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the damage of Energy Twister.

runes.name: Raging Storm
runes.description: When two twisters collide they merge into a tornado with increased area of effect that causes 435% weapon damage as Arcane over 6 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: When two twisters collide they merge into a tornado with increased area of effect and damage.

runes.name: Wicked Wind
runes.description: Twister no longer travels but spins in place dealing 304% weapon damage as Arcane over 6 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Twister no longer travels but spins in place dealing damage to everything caught in it.

runes.name: Storm Chaser
runes.description: Signature spells are: Magic Missile, Shock Pulse, Spectral Blade, Electrocute
runes.simpleDescription: Signature spells are: Magic Missile, Shock Pulse, Spectral Blade, Electrocute

skills.name: Energy Twister
skills.description:
Cost: 35 Arcane Power

Unleash a twister of pure energy that deals 435% weapon damage as Arcane over 6 seconds to everything in its path.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 35 Arcane Power

Release a raging tornado that wreaks havoc across the battlefield.

runes.name: Miasma
runes.description: Slow Time effects cling to enemies for 3 seconds after they have left the bubble.
runes.simpleDescription: Slow Time effects cling to enemies after they leave the area.

runes.name: Time Warp
runes.description: Enemies caught in the bubble of warped time take 20% more damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies caught by Slow Time take more damage.

runes.name: Time Shell
runes.description: Reduce the area Slow Time affects to 10 yards, but increases the potency of the movement speed reduction to 80%.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduce the area Slow Time affects, but increase its effect of slowing enemy movement and attack speed.

runes.name: Perpetuity
runes.description: Reduce cooldown to 16 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduce the cooldown duration of Slow Time.

runes.name: Stretch Time
runes.description: Time is sped up for any allies standing in the area, increasing their attack speed by 15%.
runes.simpleDescription: Time is sped up for any allies standing the area, increasing their attack speed.

skills.name: Slow Time
skills.description:
Cooldown: 20 seconds

Invoke a bubble of warped time and space for 8 seconds, reducing enemy attack speed by 20% and movement speed by 30%. This bubble also slows the movement of enemy projectiles by 90%.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 20 seconds

Fracture time and space, slowing enemies around you while you move unhindered.

runes.name: Reactive Armor
runes.description: Whenever you are hit, you have a chance to be enveloped with a lightning shield for 6 seconds that shocks nearby enemies for 50% weapon damage as Lightning.
runes.simpleDescription: Whenever you are hit, you have a chance to be enveloped with a lightning shield that electrocutes nearby enemies.

runes.name: Power of the Storm
runes.description: Reduce the Arcane Power cost of all Skills by 3 while Storm Armor is active.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduce the Arcane Power cost of all Skills while Storm Armor is active.

runes.name: Strike Back
runes.description: Increase the damage of the shock to 91% weapon damage as Lightning.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the damage of dealt by Storm Armor.

runes.name: Scramble
runes.description: Increase your movement speed by 25% for 3 seconds whenever you are hit by melee or ranged attacks.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase your movement speed whenever you are hit by melee or ranged attacks.

runes.name: Shocking Aspect
runes.description: Whenever you cause a Critical Hit, you have a chance to electrocute a nearby enemy for 35% weapon damage as Lightning.
runes.simpleDescription: Whenever you cause a Critical Hit, you have a chance to further electrocute a nearby enemy.

skills.name: Storm Armor
skills.description:
Cost: 25 Arcane Power

Bathe yourself in electrical energy, shocking ranged and melee attackers for 70% weapon damage as Lightning. Lasts 120 seconds.

This is an Armor spell. Only one Armor spell can be active at a time.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 25 Arcane Power

Surround yourself with a magical storm that electrocutes attackers with lightning.

Only one Armor spell can be active at a time.

runes.name: Unleashed
runes.description: Reduces the casting cost to 35 Arcane Power.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduce the casting cost of Explosive Blast.

runes.name: Time Bomb
runes.description: The blast detonates from the point it was originally cast after 2.5 seconds for 228% weapon damage as Physical.
runes.simpleDescription: The blast detonates from the point it was riginally cast after a short time delay.

runes.name: Short Fuse
runes.description: Release the energy immediately for 175% weapon damage as Physical.
runes.simpleDescription: Immediately release the energy of Explosive Blast.

runes.name: Obliterate
runes.description: Increase the explosion radius to 18 yards for 175% weapon damage as Physical.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the explosion radius of Explosive Blast.

runes.name: Chain Reaction
runes.description: 3 consecutive explosions cascade off you that each cause 61% weapon damage as Physical.
runes.simpleDescription: Multiple explosions follow the initial blast and damage enemies caught in the area.

skills.name: Explosive Blast
skills.description:
Cost: 45 Arcane Power
Cooldown: 1 second

Gather an infusion of energy around you that explodes after 1.5 seconds, causing 175% weapon damage as Physical to any enemies within 12 yards.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 45 Arcane Power
Cooldown: 1 second

Absorb energy and release it as a devastating blast.

runes.name: Convergence
runes.description: Increase the width of the beam allowing it to hit more enemies.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the width of the beam.

runes.name: Chaos Nexus
runes.description: When casting the beam you become charged with energy that spits out at nearby enemies doing 40% weapon damage as Arcane.
runes.simpleDescription: Additional beams discharge out to damage nearby enemies.

runes.name: Volatility
runes.description: Enemies killed by the beam have a 35% chance to explode causing 425% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies within 8 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies killed by the beam have a chance to explode.

runes.name: Entropy
runes.description: The beam fractures into a short ranged cone causing 195% weapon damage per second as Arcane.
runes.simpleDescription: The beam fractures into a short ranged cone instead.

runes.name: Intensify
runes.description: Damage increases slowly over time to inflict a maximum of 221% weapon damage as Arcane.
runes.simpleDescription: Damage increases the longer Disintegrate is used.

skills.name: Disintegrate
skills.description:
Cost: 20 Arcane Power

Thrust a beam of pure energy forward, dealing 170% weapon damage as Arcane and disintegrating enemies it kills.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 20 Arcane Power

Channel a beam of pure energy that pierces through all enemies.

runes.name: Arcane Hydra
runes.description: Summon an Arcane Hydra that spits Arcane Orbs which explode on impact causing 25% weapon damage as Arcane to enemies near the explosion.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon an Arcane Hydra that spits Arcane Orbs.

runes.name: Lightning Hydra
runes.description: Summon a Lightning Hydra that electrocutes enemies for 30% weapon damage as Lightning.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon a Lightning Hydra that electrocutes enemies.

runes.name: Venom Hydra
runes.description: Summon a Poison Breathing Hydra that leaves a pool of acid causing 14% weapon damage per second as Poison to enemies who remain in the pool.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon a Poison Breathing Hydra that leaves a pool of acid that damages enemies.

runes.name: Frost Hydra
runes.description: Summon a Frost Hydra that breathes a short range cone of frost causing 28% weapon damage as Cold to all enemies in the cone.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon a Frost Hydra that breathes frost, freezing enemies it hits.

runes.name: Mammoth Hydra
runes.description: Summon a Mammoth Hydra that breathes a river of flame at nearby enemies dealing 20% weapon damage per second as Fire to enemies caught in the burning ground.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon a Mammoth Hydra that breathes a river of flame, burning enemies caught in its flames.

skills.name: Hydra
skills.description:
Cost: 40 Arcane Power

Summon a multi-headed Hydra for 15 seconds that attacks enemies with bolts of fire dealing 25% weapon damage as Fire. You may only have one Hydra active at a time.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 40 Arcane Power

Summon a magical Hydra to attack enemies with bursts of fire.

runes.name: Electrify
runes.description: Attacks have a chance to cause lightning to arc to 3 nearby enemies dealing 10% of weapon damage as Lightning.
runes.simpleDescription: Attacks have a chance to cause lightning to arc towards nearby enemies.

runes.name: Force Weapon
runes.description: Increases damage bonus to 20% damage, and gives up to a 2% chance to Knockback any enemies hit.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the damage bonus of Magic Weapon and has a chance to Knockback enemies.

runes.name: Conduit
runes.description: Attacks have a chance to restore 1 Arcane Power.
runes.simpleDescription: Attacks have a chance to restore Arcane Power.

runes.name: Venom
runes.description: Attacks poison enemies, dealing 15% of weapon damage as Poison over 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Attacks poison enemies.

runes.name: Blood Magic
runes.description: Attacks recover 1.5% of damage caused as Life.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Life when damaging an enemy.

skills.name: Magic Weapon
skills.description:
Cost: 25 Arcane Power

Imbue your weapon with magical energy, granting it 10% increased Physical damage. Lasts 120 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 25 Arcane Power

Imbue your weapon with magical energy, increasing your weapon's effectiveness.

runes.name: Safe Passage
runes.description: For 4 seconds after you Teleport, you will take 30% less damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Take less damage after you Teleport.

runes.name: Wormhole
runes.description: After casting Teleport, there is a 1 second delay before the cooldown begins.
runes.simpleDescription: After casting Teleport there is a small delay before the cooldown begins, allowing you to Teleport again.

runes.name: Reversal
runes.description: Casting Teleport again within 8 seconds will instantly bring you back to your original location.
runes.simpleDescription: Casting Teleport again within 8 seconds will instantly return you to your original location.

runes.name: Fracture
runes.description: Summon 2 decoys for 8 seconds after Teleporting.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon decoys of yourself after Teleporting.

runes.name: Calamity
runes.description: Casts a low power Wave of Force upon arriving, dealing 80% weapon damage as Physical to all enemies nearby.
runes.simpleDescription: Cast a low power Wave of Force after Teleporting.

skills.name: Teleport
skills.description:
Cost: 15 Arcane Power
Cooldown: 16 seconds

Teleport through the ether to the selected location up to 35 yards away.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 15 Arcane Power
Cooldown: 16 seconds

Teleport instantly to another location.

runes.name: Molten Impact
runes.description: Increase the damage of the meteor impact to 325% weapon damage as Fire and the molten fire to 130% weapon damage as Fire over 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the damage of the Meteor impact.

runes.name: Star Pact
runes.description: Reduce casting cost to 42 Arcane Power.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduce the casting cost of Meteor.

runes.name: Meteor Shower
runes.description: Unleash a volley of 7 smaller meteors that each strike for 100% weapon damage as Fire.
runes.simpleDescription: Unleash a volley of smaller Meteors.

runes.name: Comet
runes.description: Transforms the meteor to ice that deals 300% weapon damage as Cold. The impact site is covered in a freezing mist that deals 120% weapon damage as Cold and slows the movement of enemies by 60% over 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Transforms the Meteor to ice. The impact site is covered in a freezing mist that damages enemies and slows their movement.

runes.name: Liquify
runes.description: If the initial impact causes Critical Hits, the molten fire duration is increased to 8 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: If the initial blast causes Critical Hits, the duration of the impact is increased.

skills.name: Meteor
skills.description:
Cost: 60 Arcane Power

Summon an immense meteor that plummets from the sky causing 250% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies it crashes into. The ground it hits is scorched with molten fire that deals 100% weapon damage as Fire over 3 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 60 Arcane Power

Unleash a massive meteor that scorches enemies caught in its blast.

runes.name: Simulacrum
runes.description: Increases the Life of your images to 100% of your Life.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the Life of your Mirror Images.

runes.name: Duplicates
runes.description: Summon 5 Mirror Images that have 25% of your Life each.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon 5 Mirror Images that have a percentage of your Life.

runes.name: Mocking Demise
runes.description: When an image is destroyed it explodes, doing 45% weapon damage as Physical and has 50% chance to stun enemies it hits for 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: When an Mirror Image is destroyed it explodes, possible Stunning enemies.

runes.name: Extension of Will
runes.description: The duration of the images is increased to 10 seconds and increases the Life of your images to 25% of your Life.
runes.simpleDescription: The duration of Mirror Image is increased and each double is given extra Life.

runes.name: Mirror Mimics
runes.description: Spells the images cast will do 10% of the damage as your own.
runes.simpleDescription: Spells cast by the Mirror Images deal limited damage to enemies.

skills.name: Mirror Image
skills.description:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Summon 2 illusionary duplicates of yourself that last for 7 seconds and have 25% of your Life. The images may cast some of the same spells as you, but those spells deal no damage.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Summon 2 illusions of yourself to distract enemies.

runes.name: Grasping Chill
runes.description: After the Blizzard ends, cover the ground in a low lying mist for 3 seconds that slows any enemies who enters it.
runes.simpleDescription: After the Blizzard ends, cover the ground in a low lying mist that slows enemies that enter it.

runes.name: Frozen Solid
runes.description: Enemies caught in the storm have a 20% chance to be frozen for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies caught in the storm have a chance to be frozen.

runes.name: Snowbound
runes.description: Reduce the casting cost to 30 Arcane Power.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduce the casting cost of Blizzard.

runes.name: Stark Winter
runes.description: Increase the size of the Blizzard to cover 22 yards, dealing 175% weapon damage over 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the area Blizzard affects.

runes.name: Unrelenting Storm
runes.description: Increase the duration of the Blizzard to deal 233% weapon damage over 4 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the duration of the Blizzard.

skills.name: Blizzard
skills.description:
Cost: 45 Arcane Power

Call down shards of ice to pelt an area dealing 175% weapon damage as Cold to all enemies in the area over 3 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 45 Arcane Power

Unleash a blizzard that damages and slows enemies caught in its grasp.

runes.name: Sparkflint
runes.description: Summons a fiery Familiar that increases damage of all attacks by 15% while Familiar is active.
runes.simpleDescription: Summons a fiery Familiar that increases damage of all your attacks.

runes.name: Dartling
runes.description: Summons a lightning Familiar whose projectiles have a 100% chance to pierce through enemies.
runes.simpleDescription: Summons a lightning Familiar whose projectiles have a chance to pierce enemies.

runes.name: Ancient Guardian
runes.description: Summons a protective Familiar. When you are below 35% Life the Familiar will fully absorb damage from 1 attack every 6 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Summons a protective Familiar. When you are below 35% Life the Familiar will fully absorb damage you receive.

runes.name: Arcanot
runes.description: While the Familiar is active you, regenerate 2 Arcane Power per second.
runes.simpleDescription: While the Familiar is active, you regenerate Arcane Power.

runes.name: Cannoneer
runes.description: The Familiar's projectiles explode on impact dealing 20% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies within 6 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: The Familiar's projectile attacks explode on impact.

skills.name: Familiar
skills.description:
Cost: 20 Arcane Power

Summon a companion that will attack your targets for 20% weapon damage as Arcane. This companion cannot be targeted or damaged by enemies. Pet lasts 120 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 20 Arcane Power

Summon a mystical companion. Your Familiar is immune to damage and will assist you in combat.

runes.name: Absorption
runes.description: You have a chance to gain 4 Arcane Power whenever you are hit by a ranged or melee attack.
runes.simpleDescription: You have a chance to gain Arcane Power whenever you are hit by a ranged or melee attack.

runes.name: Pinpoint Barrier
runes.description: Also increases your chance to critical hit by 5% while Energy Armor is active.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase your chance to cause Critical Hits.

runes.name: Energy Tap
runes.description: Rather than reducing your maximum Arcane Power, it is increased by 20 while Energy Armor is active.
runes.simpleDescription: Energy Armor generates Arcane Power instead of costing it when used.

runes.name: Force Armor
runes.description: While Energy Armor is active, incoming attacks that would deal more than 35% of your maximum Life are reduced to deal 35% of your maximum Life instead.
runes.simpleDescription: While Energy Armor is active, incoming attacks that would deal more than 35% of your maximum Life are reduced to deal 35% of your maximum Life instead.

runes.name: Prismatic Armor
runes.description: Increases all of your resistances by 40% while Energy Armor is active.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases your ability to Resistance all damage types.

skills.name: Energy Armor
skills.description:
Cost: 25 Arcane Power

Focus your energies, increasing your Armor by 65% but lowers your maximum Arcane Power by 20. Lasts 120 seconds.

This is an Armor spell. Only one Armor spell can be active at a time.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 25 Arcane Power

Increase your Armor at the cost of lowering maximum Arcane Power.

Only one Armor spell can be active at a time.

runes.name: Arcane Destruction
runes.description: An explosion erupts around you when you transform causing 450% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies within 15 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: An explosion erupts around you when you transform.

runes.name: Teleport
runes.description: Archon form can now cast Teleport with a cooldown of 10 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Archon form can now cast Teleport.

runes.name: Pure Power
runes.description: Decrease the cooldown of Archon to 100 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Decrease the cooldown duration of Archon.

runes.name: Slow Time
runes.description: Archon form can now cast Slow Time that lasts for 8 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Archon form can now cast Slow Time.

runes.name: Improved Archon
runes.description: Increase damage of all Archon abilities by 25%.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase damage of all Archon abilities.

skills.name: Archon
skills.description:
Cost: 25 Arcane Power
Cooldown: 120 seconds

Transform into a being of pure arcane energy for 15 seconds. While in Archon form your normal abilities are replaced by powerful Archon abilities, and your armor and resistances are increased by 40%. Every enemy killed while in Archon form adds 1 second to the duration of Archon.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 25 Arcane Power
Cooldown: 120 seconds

Become a being of pure unstoppable energy and gain potent new abilities for 15 seconds.
